text: MOH of India and others are pushing for cotton DIY masks but this article suggests that cotton is not the best option considering it is permeable and breathable. <https://www.google.com/amp/s/www.businessinsider.com/homemade-mask-using-hydro-knit-shop-towel-filters-better-2020-4%3famp|https://www.google.com/amp/s/www.businessinsider.com/homemade-mask-using-hydro-knit-shop-towel-filters-better-2020-4%3famp>

attachments.title: Using blue shop towels in homemade face masks can filter particles 2x to 3x better than cotton, 3 clothing designers discover after testing dozens of fabrics
attachments.text: Three clothing makers built their own particle-testing lab to design a better homemade surgical mask.
attachments.fallback: Business Insider: Using blue shop towels in homemade face masks can filter particles 2x to 3x better than cotton, 3 clothing designers discover after testing dozens of fabrics

This material, if available in Ethiopia could likely be used for the healthcare workers. <@U010P2VU7ND> shared a similar article using polypropylene sheet.. <https://ufhealth.org/news/2020/uf-health-anesthesiology-team-devises-respirator-mask-made-existing-hospital-materials>

He is checking for availability fo the raw material.
<@U011J64BXCY> - In case you haven't heard of  this new material - it is supposed to be better than N95 mask material.

attachments.service_name: UF Health, University of Florida Health
attachments.title: UF Health anesthesiology team devises respirator mask made from existing hospital materials
attachments.text: With respiratory masks used by health workers battling the coronavirus in short supply, the University of Florida Health’s department of anesthesiology has developed masks that can be produced in large quantities using materials already found in hospitals and medical facilities.
attachments.fallback: UF Health, University of Florida Health: UF Health anesthesiology team devises respirator mask made from existing hospital materials

text: Hi <@UVALAR52P>  and all .... As you know the Medtronic's Ventilator is a very complex design, and software driven device --- manufactured in the Galway Ireland plant -- I know Medtronic is willing to help in Ethiopia's plight but the how fast  and when/where are not trivial tasks... Let me know if you want to connect with Medtronic in US or Galway, Ireland ...  or how else I can help.

attachments.title: TheOpenVentilator
attachments.text: The Open Ventilator es un respirador artificial diseñado para ayudar a pacientes de COVID-19 con dificultades respiratorias graves. Este dispositivo está pensando para cuando no se disponga de alternativas adecuadas, dado que es de bajo coste y producción escalable.

elements.text: https://en.theopenventilator.com/

text: <@UVAL943JP> <@U0107JERE9L> yes the US FDA  yesterday approved a novel method of cleaning upto 80,000 masks per day .. <https://www.wsbtv.com/news/trending/coronavirus-invention-being-installed-washington-state-can-sterilize-recycle-80000-protective-masks-daily/ANHLUYQUBNEHPG52SNBDW7DYWA/>

attachments.title: Coronavirus: Invention being installed in Washington state can sterilize, recycle 80,000 protective masks daily
attachments.text: A large, revolutionary decontamination system being installed at Camp Murray, which will be able to clean and sterilize up to 80,000 protective N95 respirator masks every day, is being called an exciting breakthrough that could help solve the shortage of masks for health care professionals fighting the COVID-19 pandemic.
